channel.title: Philadelphia on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in Philadelphia on Life At The Circus

item.title: Family Field Trip
item.description: This year in History we are studying American History from the explorers to the war on 1812. I love history. It is my favorite part of home schooling. And I am so grateful that we live within driving distance of so many great historical sites. I really wanted to take the kids to Philadelphia for a day trip over spring break. Scott graciously rearranged his work schedule so that he could join us.
